extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://matroska.org/technical/specs/index.html , http://www.matroska.org/files/matroska.pdf, https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/charter-ietf-cellar/</field><field name="filenameExtension">mkv, mka, mks, mk3d</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: Audiovisual file format that can wrap an unlimited number of video, audio, still picture, and/or subtitle tracks.  A wide range of audio and video encodings are supported.
name: Matroska Multimedia Container
